name: Street photography tour (North to South)
description:
When we go on a citytrip, we want to catch the special moments and places we visit by
taking pictures. In that way we can share our memories with friends and look
back on our trip from time to time.
We like to have pictures of our favorite spots in the city, bars, buildings, and
architecture. We want the pictures to be as beautiful as when we saw it in that
moment. Unfortunately, when we see our pictures back, they don’t appear to be very different or unique from others. Or they are not as special as we hoped they would be.
